Identity.Name: Archer of Celintra
Identity.Basic_Description: Archers clad in robes with blue 'aura' bows

Abilities.Name: Lob
Abilities.Ability: When calculating line of site, Archers of Celintra can pivot their straight line one time vertically.

Abilities.Name: Phase
Abilities.Ability: When sprinting, Archers of Celintra can move through solid objects if their sprint would end on a valid location.
